import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.OutputStream;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;

public class MainClass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Integer data1 =  null ;
	String data2  = (String) null ;
	String data3  = (String) null ;
	Integer data4 =  null ;

	while(true) {
		try {
			ServerSocket server = new ServerSocket(9999);
			System.out.println("사용자 접속 대기");
			
			Socket socket = server.accept();
			
			InputStream input = socket.getInputStream();
			DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(input);
			
			OutputStream output = socket.getOutputStream();
			DataOutputStream dos = new DataOutputStream(output);
		
			data4 = dis.readInt();	
			if (data4 == 1 ) {	
				data1 = dis.readInt();	
				 data2 = dis.readUTF();
			     data3 = dis.readUTF();
			System.out.printf("주문 서버전송\n");
			System.out.printf("테이블 번호 : %s\n", data1);
			System.out.printf("가계이름 : %s\n", data2);
			System.out.printf("data3 : %s\n", data3);
			}else if (data4 == 2){
		
		
		
			System.out.printf("주문 어플전송\n");
			System.out.printf("테이블 번호 : %s\n", data1);
			dos.writeInt(data1);
			System.out.printf("가계이름 : %s\n", data2);
		 	dos.writeUTF(data2);
			System.out.printf("data3 : %s\n", data3);
			dos.writeUTF(data3);
			}
				/*int data1 = dis.readInt();		
				String data2 = dis.readUTF();
				String data3 = dis.readUTF();
		*/
				
			
					
			
			socket.close();
			server.close();
			

		}catch(Exception e) {
			
			e.printStackTrace();
			
		}
	
		
		
	}
	}

}
